snippet: The British, Scottish and local governments have promoted Orkney, accessible by boat within an hour, as ideal for testing innovations in wave and tidal energy generation under extreme conditions.
abstract: British, Scottish and local governments have promoted Orkney, island accessible by boat within an hour, as ideal testing ground for innovations in wave and tidal energy generation under extreme conditions; analysts predict that wave and tidal power has potential to provide as much as 15 percent of electricity generated in United States in next two decades.
lead_paragraph: The British, Scottish and local governments have promoted Orkney, accessible by boat within an hour, as ideal for testing innovations in wave and tidal energy generation under extreme conditions.

headline.main: Off Scottish Coast, Harnessing Motion of Ocean Waves
headline.print_headline: Off Scottish Coast, Harnessing Motion Of Ocean Waves
